dcterms:creator: Michael Gelfond
Daniela Inclezan
dcterms:description: An action language used to model non-Boolean fluents and non-deterministic causal laws, providing the desired expressive power for robotics domains.
dcterms:title: ALd (Action Language ALd)

dcterms:creator: Marcello Balduccini
Michael Gelfond
dcterms:description: An extension of Answer Set Prolog that incorporates consistency-restoring rules, supporting non-monotonic logical reasoning with incomplete commonsense knowledge.
dcterms:title: CR-Prolog

dcterms:creator: M. Gelfond
Y. Kahl
dcterms:description: A programming paradigm that allows for knowledge representation and reasoning, particularly useful in dynamic domains.
dcterms:title: ASP (Answer Set Programming)

dcterms:creator: Evgenii Balai
Michael Gelfond
Yuanlin Zhang
dcterms:description: A framework aimed at enhancing Answer Set Programming with sorts, facilitating better organization and reasoning in complex domains.
dcterms:title: SPARC

dcterms:creator: G. Dissanayake
P. Newman
S. Clark
dcterms:description: A framework for solving the simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) problem, crucial for mobile robotics.
dcterms:title: Robot Operating System (ROS)
